unnormalised: Payment gateways, eh? It's like deciding which aunty to ask for Rs. 500 at an Onam sadhya – each has their own quirks! From Razorpay to Billdesk, it's a jungle out there! Integration is smoother than Amma's biryani, hopefully! Wish me luck getting my e-commerce site live before Diwali. My budget is tighter than a dhoti in Mumbai local! May Bhagwan give me strength (and conversions!).
